enhanced_by.reason: Both methods initialize the state of the FromBuilder object, clearing existing steps and bindings.
addAll method adds steps to the FromBuilder, which can be reset by the clear method.
The build method relies on the state of steps and bindings, which should be cleared before invoking build to ensure a fresh state.
Similar to build, buildSimplify relies on the state of steps and bindings, which should be cleared before invoking it.
